title: Christmas Gift Guide 2018: Gifts for gardeners | Trusted Reviews
description:
Gardening is becoming more popular with all ages as we all try to make the
most of whatever outside space we have.

Whether you’re choosing for a gardener with a postage stamp-sized patch of
land or something more akin to a national park, we’ve got great gifts to suit
any budget.

## Sub £20 gifts for gardeners

### [Insect hotel £16.94](https://amzn.to/2OfKjBX)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2OfKjBX)

You don’t generally want insects in your house – unless just for the company –
but in your garden they are a very good thing. The right ones pollinate your
plants and help keep your garden healthy. Encourage them into your garden with
a five-star insect hotel for them to make a home in.

  * [**Buy an Insect hotel from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2OfKjBX)

### [Garden gloves £6.97](https://amzn.to/2DfQ4yu)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2DfQ4yu)

Every gardener needs gloves if they don’t want permanently filthy nails and
fingers full of thorns. However, many gardening gloves are so thick that it’s
tricky to actually do anything requiring any dexterity. These bamboo gloves
are thinner than most, so they’ll still give you the required protection but
also greater control.

  * [**Buy Garden gloves from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2DfQ4yu)

## Sub £50 gifts for gardeners

### [Survival Spade £21.99](https://amzn.to/2OXenaB)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2OXenaB)

Is it likely that you’ll _need_ a survival spade for the gardening? No. Is it
likely the recipient will love having it? Absolutely. This folding shovel
comes in its own neat little pouch and can be reconfigured for not only
digging but sawing, hammering, cutting, picking and chopping. Also, very
crucially, it opens beer bottles, which any hardworking gardener will deserve
at the end of a long day.

  * [**Buy a Survival Spade from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2OXenaB)

### Garden vac/leaf blower £49.99

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

Leaves in autumn can be absolute pain in the neck, covering your whole garden
in the space of one blustery day. Make short work of them with this leaf
vac/blower. If you don’t want the neighbours to hate you then we recommend
vacuuming rather than blowing everything over the fence.

  * **Read the[Woodfield Garden Vac/Leaf Blower review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/woodfield-te0657-garden-vac-and-leaf-blower)**

## Sub £100 gifts for gardeners

### Ikea Barbecue £90

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

Not just a great stop for tea lights, meatballs or a family argument, Ikea
also produces some lovely garden furniture, including this slightly alien
looking barbecue. Pleasingly designed, for the price it’s excellent quality.

  * **Read the[Ikea Barbecue review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/ikea-bbq)**

### [GTech Cordless grass trimmer £99](https://amzn.to/2ABs6eJ)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2ABs6eJ)

Make edge-trimming much quicker and more convenient with this top notch
cordless trimmer. No worrying about how far the lead is going to stretch. Just
charge it up and then get your lawn looking perfect.

  * **Read the[GTech Cordless grass trimmer review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/gtech-st20-cordless-grass-trimmer)**
  * [**Buy a Gtech Cordless grass trimmer**](https://amzn.to/2ABs6eJ)

## Sub £200 gifts for gardeners

### [Karcher S650 Push Sweeper – £121](https://amzn.to/2CPk8jq)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2CPk8jq)

Getting a filthy patio sparkling clean is deeply satisfying, but the effort to
do it is exhausting. This Karcher push sweeper makes it a doddle, whisking
away all before it and leaving your patio or path looking pristine.

  * **Read the[Karcher S650 Push Sweeper review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/karcher-s650)**
  * [**Buy a Karcher S650 Push Sweeper from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2CPk8jq)

### [Charbroil Kettleman – £169.49](https://amzn.to/2CNYwUG)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2CNYwUG)

An absolutely classically designed barbecue for the person in your life who
loves cooking outdoors. It’s a traditional model with no electric convenience
(or cheating, as some may call it), but the work required from creating your
own fire is repaid in flavour.

  * **Read the[Charbroil Kettleman review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/char-broil-kettleman)**
  * [**Buy a Charbroil Kettleman from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2CNYwUG)

### [Flymo Mighty Mo – £144.93](https://amzn.to/2DaAdBp)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2DaAdBp)

If you only have a small lawn, you don’t want a giant mower. This neat
cordless mower is ideal for a little garden and doesn’t require much storage
space. Not recommended for larger gardens due to the small bin.

  * **Read the[Flymo Mighty Mo review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/flymo-mighti-mo-300-li)**
  * [**Buy a Flymo Mighty Mo from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2DaAdBp)

## Money no object gifts for gardeners

### [Robomow – £2,999](https://amzn.to/2OVpDo5)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2OVpDo5)

Is it absurd to spend nearly £3,000 on a lawnmower? Of course it is. However,
if you’ve got the funds then the thrill of watching your own robot mower
chugging around keeping your garden neat with absolutely no effort from you is
completely worth it.

  * **Read the[Robomow review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/robomow-rs635-pro-sx)**
  * [**Buy a Robomow from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2OVpDo5)

### [Ego Cordless mower – £799](https://amzn.to/2OY7k1u)

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

If your budget doesn’t quite stretch to the self-guiding lawnmower, then this
cordless one from EGO is almost as fun. You’ll have to push it yourself, but
you won’t be trailing cord everywhere. One charge lasts almost an hour, which
should do most gardens.

  * **Read the[Ego Cordless mower review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/ego-lm2122e-sp-cordless-lawnmower)**
  * [**Buy an Ego Cordless mower from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2OY7k1u)

### [Netgear camera – £214.99](https://amzn.to/2yF8QLM)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2yF8QLM)

Home security is important. This external camera will give you peace of mind
when you’re away. It’s very easy to set up and the image quality is excellent.
Also recommended for wildlife lovers who want to know what sort of creatures
are wandering around the garden after dark.

  * **Read the[Netgear camera review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/netgear-arlo-pro)**
  * [**Buy a Netgear camera from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2yF8QLM)

### [Charbroil Big Easy – £268](https://amzn.to/2SvK20U)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2SvK20U)

An absolute beast of a barbecue, the Charbroil Big Easy smokes, roasts and
grills. Anyone who receives this is likely to become an absolute nerd about
wood chips and smoking times, which is fine as long as you get to eat the
results of their research.

  * **Read the[Charbroil Big Easy review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/char-broil-big-easy-srg)**
  * [**Buy a Charbroil Big Easy from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2SvK20U)

### [Honda Brushcutter – £355](https://amzn.to/2CRaNry)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2CRaNry)

This is one very serious strimmer, with very heavy duty blades that will make
short work of tough vegetation. This isn’t for the gardener who is just
looking to keep their herbaceous borders neat. This is for the garden
renovator who needs to turn a wild, overgrown thicket into something a bit
more manageable.

  * **Read the[Honda Brushcutter review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/honda-umk-425e-brushcutter)**
  * **[Buy a Honda Brushcutter from Amazon](https://amzn.to/2CRaNry)**
